level.heading: Partnership property.
level.text: Property acquired by a partnership shall be property of the partnership and not of the partners individually.

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For history of Law 18-378, see notes under § 29-101.01.

level.heading: Uniform Law:
level.text: This section is based on § 203 of the Uniform Partnership Act (1997 Act). See Vol. 6, Part I , Uniform Laws Annotated, Master Edition or ULA Database on Westlaw.
